name: corpus

corpus noun [C]
(LANGUAGE DATABASE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a collection of written or spoken material stored on a computer and used to find out how language is used: All the dictionary examples are taken from a corpus of billions of words.

corpus noun [C]
(COLLECTION OF WRITING)
a collection of a single writer's work, or of writing about a particular subject
